title: El Morro National Monument: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park       Make a Donation! Thank you for your interest in supporting El Morro National Monument. Your donation will enhance the programs and activities to protect park resources and provide visitor services for El Morro National Monument. Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference. We welcome and are grateful for your support of El Morro National Monument.  There are several ways to support El Morro National Monument. The park is able to accept direct monetary donations. If you are interested in donating to the park directly you may contact the Superintendent by phone (505-285-4641 x12) or email e-mail us.  Donations may be mailed to:  Superintendent Mitzi Frank 123 E. Roosevelt Avenue Grants, NM 87020  Please make checks or money orders payable to DOI, National Park Service. You can also donate your time by volunteering.
